data.message:
Plz Tell Me How To Get blue bagde on Facebook Profile 
I shall be very thankful to you

replies.message: Hi Khan. If your Page represents a celebrity, public figure, sports team, media or entertainment, you may be eligible for a blue verification badge. Additionally, some Pages for local businesses and other organizations may be eligible for a gray verification badge. Learn more here: http://bit.ly/2k8IEzw. -Joe
I am public figure and from where can I get blue bagde not on Page on Profile
Hey facebook plz see my comment below and respond, I need help that's why I need to contact you.
